text_combined: Meeting Reminder: Hi team, just a reminder that our meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 10 AM in conference room B. Please review the agenda attached. Regards, John Doe
Invoice Attached: Dear customer, please find the attached invoice for your recent purchase. Let us know if you have any questions. Thank you for your business. Sincerely, The Billing Team
Welcome to Our Newsletter: Hello, thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! We look forward to keeping you updated with our latest news and offers. Best regards, The Marketing Team

Account Verification Required: Dear user, we noticed unusual activity on your account. Please verify your account by clicking the link below to avoid suspension. [phishing link] Regards, The Security Team
Congratulations! You've Won a Prize: Hi there, congratulations! You've won a $1000 gift card. Click here to claim your prize now. [phishing link] Best wishes, The Contest Team

Urgent: Password Reset Request: Dear user, we received a request to reset your password. If you did not make this request, please click the link below to cancel it. [phishing link] Regards, The Support Team
